mapper.insert: insert into shippingLists values((select NVL(MAX(slNo) + 1, 1) from shippingLists), #{slmemId}, #{slAddress})
mapper.update: update shippingLists set slAddress = #{slAddress} where slNo = #{slNo}
mapper.select: select count(*) from shippingLists where slmemId = #{slmemId}
select * from (select rownum rnum, temp.* from (select * from shippingLists where slmemId = #{slmemId} order by slNo desc) temp) where rnum >= #{contStart} and rnum <= #{contEnd}
